titles.title: Commemorating the life and legacy of labor pioneer Kate Mullany in honor of Women's History Month.
Commemorating the life and legacy of labor pioneer Kate Mullany in honor of Women's History Month.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: This resolution commemorates the life of labor pioneer Kate Mullany, who fought for safe working conditions and reasonable wages for women in the 19th century.
